stateDiagram

state HUNTING {

        BASIC

        BASIC : BASIC

        BASIC : enter / #123; e.tile("mad")#59; #125;

        BASIC : do / #123; e.huntPlayer()#59;\ne.debugCircle(4, "#FF08")#59; #125;

        BASIC : exit / #123;  #125;

        state "$initial_state" as HUNTING.(InitialState)

        HUNTING__SOUND_ALARM

        HUNTING__SOUND_ALARM : HUNTING__SOUND_ALARM

        HUNTING__SOUND_ALARM : enter / #123; e.alarm.setForHunt()#59; #125;

        HUNTING__SOUND_ALARM : enter / #123; e.alarm.enter()#59; #125;

        HUNTING__SOUND_ALARM : do / #123; e.alarm.do()#59; #125;

        HUNTING__SOUND_ALARM : exit / #123; e.alarm.exit()#59; #125;

        HUNTING__SOUND_ALARM : ALARM / #123;  #125;

        CHARGE

        CHARGE : CHARGE

        CHARGE : enter / #123; e.chargeEnter()#59; #125;

        CHARGE : do / #123; e.chargeDo()#59; #125;

        CHARGE : exit / #123; e.chargeExit()#59; #125;

        CHARGE_REST

        CHARGE_REST : CHARGE_REST

        CHARGE_REST : enter / #123; e.chargeTimer.set(1.5)#59;\ne.tile("groggy")#59; #125;

        CHARGE_REST : do / #123;  #125;

        CHARGE_REST : exit / #123;  #125;

        state "$exit_pt.idle" as HUNTING.(ExitPoint)(idle)

        state "$exit_pt.enemy_win" as HUNTING.(ExitPoint)(enemy_win)

}

ENEMY_WIN

ENEMY_WIN : ENEMY_WIN

ENEMY_WIN : enter / #123; e.tile("chomp")#59;\ne.swellSpeed = 60#59;\ne.play("laugh")#59;\ntimer.set(3)#59;\ne.dance.enter()#59; #125;

ENEMY_WIN : do / #123; e.dance.do()#59; #125;

ENEMY_WIN : exit / #123; e.dance.exit()#59; #125;

state IDLE {

        state CHECK_VISION {

                DANCE

                DANCE : DANCE

                DANCE : enter / #123; e.tile("awake")#59;\ntimer.set(10)#59;\ne.dance.enter()#59; #125;

                DANCE : do / #123; e.dance.do()#59; #125;

                DANCE : exit / #123; e.dance.exit()#59; #125;

                WAKING

                WAKING : WAKING

                WAKING : enter / #123; e.waking.enter()#59; #125;

                WAKING : do / #123; e.waking.do()#59; #125;

                WAKING : do / #123; e.debugCircle(3, "#0F08")#59; #125;

                WAKING : exit / #123; e.waking.exit()#59; #125;

                FALLING_A_SLEEP

                FALLING_A_SLEEP : FALLING_A_SLEEP

                FALLING_A_SLEEP : enter / #123; e.lulling.enter()#59; #125;

                FALLING_A_SLEEP : do / #123; e.lulling.do()#59; #125;

                FALLING_A_SLEEP : exit / #123; e.lulling.exit()#59; #125;

                state CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() <>

                state CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() <>

        }

        state "$initial_state" as IDLE.(InitialState)

        SURPRISED

        SURPRISED : SURPRISED

        SURPRISED : enter / #123; e.surprised.enter()#59; #125;

        SURPRISED : do / #123; e.surprised.do()#59; #125;

        SURPRISED : exit / #123; e.surprised.exit()#59; #125;

        state IDLE.(ChoicePoint)() <>

        state "$exit_pt.hunt" as IDLE.(ExitPoint)(hunt)

        state "$exit_pt.sound_alarm" as IDLE.(ExitPoint)(sound_alarm)

        state SLEEPING {

                DEEP_SLEEP

                DEEP_SLEEP : DEEP_SLEEP

                DEEP_SLEEP : enter / #123; timer.set(rand(3,8))#59; #125;

                DEEP_SLEEP : do / #123; e.debugCircle(1, "#0F08")#59; \ne.debugTextAboveMe("zzz...")#59; #125;

                DEEP_SLEEP : exit / #123;  #125;

                state "$initial_state" as SLEEPING.(InitialState)

                ABOUT_TO_STIR

                ABOUT_TO_STIR : ABOUT_TO_STIR

                ABOUT_TO_STIR : enter / #123; timer.set(rand(0.5, 2))#59; #125;

                ABOUT_TO_STIR : do / #123; e.debugTextAboveMe("zz..")#59; #125;

                ABOUT_TO_STIR : exit / #123;  #125;

                state "$exit_pt.1" as SLEEPING.(ExitPoint)(1)

        }

}

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

Enemy3Sm__SOUND_ALARM

Enemy3Sm__SOUND_ALARM : Enemy3Sm__SOUND_ALARM

Enemy3Sm__SOUND_ALARM : enter / #123; e.alarm.setForEvade()#59; #125;

Enemy3Sm__SOUND_ALARM : enter / #123; e.alarm.enter()#59; #125;

Enemy3Sm__SOUND_ALARM : do / #123; e.alarm.do()#59; #125;

Enemy3Sm__SOUND_ALARM : exit / #123; e.alarm.exit()#59; #125;

Enemy3Sm__SOUND_ALARM : ALARM / #123;  #125;

HUNTING --> HUNTING.(ExitPoint)(idle) : do [timer.elapsed()]

HUNTING --> HUNTING.(ExitPoint)(enemy_win) : do [player.isDead()]

BASIC --> CHARGE : do [e.playerDist() < 4 &&\nrand() < 0.02]

BASIC --> HUNTING__SOUND_ALARM : do [rand() < 0.004]

HUNTING.(InitialState) --> BASIC

HUNTING__SOUND_ALARM --> BASIC : do [e.alarm.isDone()]

CHARGE --> CHARGE_REST : do [e.isChargeDone()]

CHARGE_REST --> BASIC : do [e.chargeTimer.elapsed()]

HUNTING.(ExitPoint)(idle) --> IDLE

HUNTING.(ExitPoint)(enemy_win) --> ENEMY_WIN

ENEMY_WIN --> HUNTING : do [timer.elapsed()]

IDLE --> IDLE.(ExitPoint)(hunt) : ALARM

CHECK_VISION --> SURPRISED : DAMAGED

CHECK_VISION --> SURPRISED : do [e.canSeePlayer(6)]

DANCE --> FALLING_A_SLEEP : 1. do [timer.elapsed() &&\ne.dance.isDone()]

WAKING --> CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() : 1. do [e.waking.isDone()]

FALLING_A_SLEEP --> SLEEPING : 1. do [e.lulling.isDone()]

CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() --> DANCE : [e.playerDist() < 3 ||\nrand() < 0.5]

CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() --> FALLING_A_SLEEP : else

CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() --> DANCE : else

CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() --> FALLING_A_SLEEP : [rand() > 0.5]

IDLE.(InitialState) --> CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)()

SURPRISED --> IDLE.(ChoicePoint)() : do [e.surprised.isDone()]

SURPRISED --> IDLE.(ChoicePoint)() : DAMAGED

IDLE.(ChoicePoint)() --> IDLE.(ExitPoint)(sound_alarm) : [rand() < 0.5]

IDLE.(ChoicePoint)() --> IDLE.(ExitPoint)(hunt) : else / #123; e.jumpTowardsPlayer() #125;

IDLE.(ExitPoint)(hunt) --> HUNTING

IDLE.(ExitPoint)(sound_alarm) --> Enemy3Sm__SOUND_ALARM

SLEEPING --> SURPRISED : DAMAGED

DEEP_SLEEP --> ABOUT_TO_STIR : do [timer.elapsed() ||\ne.playerDist() < 1]

SLEEPING.(InitialState) --> DEEP_SLEEP

ABOUT_TO_STIR --> SLEEPING.(ExitPoint)(1) : do [timer.elapsed()]

SLEEPING.(ExitPoint)(1) --> WAKING

ROOT.(InitialState) --> IDLE

Enemy3Sm__SOUND_ALARM --> HUNTING : do [e.alarm.isDone()]
Events
settings
